t: A*p prophecy concerning Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.
The*pn Lord*s is a jealous and avenging God; the*ld Lord*s takes vengeance and is filled with wrath. The*ln Lord*s takes vengeance on his foes and*ld vents his wrath against his enemies.
The*ln Lord*s is slow to anger but great in power; the*ld Lord*s will not leave the guilty unpunished. His*ln way is in the whirlwind and the storm, and*ld clouds are the dust of his feet.
He*ln rebukes the sea and dries it up; he*ld makes all the rivers run dry. Bashan*ln and Carmel wither and*ld the blossoms of Lebanon fade.
The*ln mountains quake before him and*ld the hills melt away. The*ln earth trembles at his presence, the*ld world and all who live in it.
Who*ln can withstand his indignation? Who*ld can endure his fierce anger? His*ln wrath is poured out like fire; the*ld rocks are shattered before him.
The*pn Lord*s is good, a*ld refuge in times of trouble. He*ln cares for those who trust in him,
but*ld with an overwhelming flood he*ln will make an end of Nineveh; he*ld will pursue his foes into the realm of darkness.
Whatever*pn they plot against the Lord*s he*ld will bring to an end; trouble*ld will not come a second time.
They*ln will be entangled among thorns and*ld drunk from their wine; they*ld will be consumed like dry stubble.
From*ln you, Nineveh, has one come forth who*ld plots evil against the Lord*s and*ld devises wicked plans.
This*p is what the Lord*s says: “Although*pn they have allies and are numerous, they*ld will be destroyed and pass away. Although*ln I have afflicted you, Judah, I*ld will afflict you no more.
Now*ln I will break their yoke from your neck and*ld tear your shackles away.”

The*pn Lord*s has given a command concerning you, Nineveh: “You*ld will have no descendants to bear your name. I*ln will destroy the images and idols that*ld are in the temple of your gods. I*ln will prepare your grave, for*ld you are vile.”

Look,*pn there on the mountains, the*ld feet of one who brings good news, who*ld proclaims peace! Celebrate*ln your festivals, Judah, and*ld fulfill your vows. No*ln more will the wicked invade you; they*ld will be completely destroyed.
